entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 8:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: NNE 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening then north 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
